diff_hunk:
@@ -7,6 +7,7 @@ if (NOT __NCCL_INCLUDED)
       add_library(__caffe2_nccl INTERFACE)
       target_link_libraries(__caffe2_nccl INTERFACE ${NCCL_LIBRARIES})
       target_include_directories(__caffe2_nccl INTERFACE ${NCCL_INCLUDE_DIRS})
+      set(NCCL_EXTERNAL FALSE)
body:
It prevents the following:
```
CMake Warning (dev) at cmake/Dependencies.cmake:792 (add_dependencies):
  Policy CMP0046 is not set: Error on non-existent dependency in
  add_dependencies.  Run "cmake --help-policy CMP0046" for policy details.
  Use the cmake_policy command to set the policy and suppress this warning.

  The dependency target "nccl_external" of target "gloo_cuda" does not exist.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:200 (include)
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.
```
